precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Sit in a chair in front of a table, with your forearm resting on the table, palm facing the ceiling and elbow in line with your wrist and your shoulder.
Bring your right thumb to touch the tip of your index finger as much as you can
Release the pinch between your right thumb and the index finger
Bring your right thumb to touch your middle finger as much as you can
Release the pinch between your right thumb and the middle finger
Bring your right thumb to touch your ring finger as much as you can
Release the pinch between your right thumb and the ring finger
Bring your right thumb to touch your pinky as much as you can, trying to touch the tip of the thumb
Release the pinch between your right thumb and the pinky
Repeat this exercise once more for each digit
